page.title: 08LEISURE TIME IN L.STAUGHTON
page.content: A great variety of leisure activities are pursued by the villagers. Knitting,sewing,lace making, embroidery, tapestry and patchwork are favoured by the ladies, whilst table games like whist,bridge,scrabble or chess are enjoyed by families.Outdoor activities are bowls,tennis, cricket,football,bird watching,walking,and gardening.Many people also watch television and listen to the radio or read books. Some people enjoy club activities such as the{Women's Institute}and religious group meetings.People travel into Bedford to or Sharnbrook to attend vocational or academic evening classes. The local hunt meets in the village and there is pheasant and partridge shooting.
